catalyzed_reaction: Ring-opening of cyclohexene oxide with NaOCN to produce trans-hexahydro-2(3H)-benzoxazolone (trans-HBC).
formulation: Whole cell biocatalyst (E. coli BL21 expressing HheG from Ilumatobacter coccineus); also tested as cell lysate.
name: Halohydrin dehalogenase HheG from Ilumatobacter coccineus (IcHheG)
purity_specification: Not specified for whole cell catalyst; lysate used for comparison.
sequence_amino_acid: UniProt: A0A1Y1ZLJ2 (for HheG from Ilumatobacter coccineus; sequence not given in text, but referenced in PDB: 5O30)
supplier: Self-produced by Enzymaster (Ningbo) Bio-engineering Co., Ltd.
